REPORT.name: Операторы-Детально
REPORT.description: Отчет показывает детальную информацию по закрытым сменам операторов --- Author: GameClass Software support@gameclass.ru
REPORT.code:
Declare @TimeStart datetime Declare @TimeStop datetime
set @TimeStart = %TIME-START% set @TimeStop = %TIME-STOP%
select [name] [Оператор], ShiftStop [Закрытие смены], FullSumm [Общая сумма], isnull(CompSumm,0) [Вручную], isnull(AccSumm,0) [Оплачено с УЗ], isnull(ServSumm,0) [Услуги], isnull(AccAdded,0) [Добавлено на УЗ], isnull(AccReturned,0) [Возвращено на УЗ], comment [Комментарий] from (select ShiftStart, ShiftStop, FullSumm, CompSumm, AccSumm, ServSumm, AccAdded, sum(AccountsReturned.summa) AccReturned from (select ShiftStart, ShiftStop, FullSumm, CompSumm, AccSumm, ServSumm, sum(summa) AccAdded from (select ShiftStart, ShiftStop, FullSumm, CompSumm, AccSumm, sum(count*price) ServSumm from (select ShiftStart, ShiftStop, FullSumm, CompSumm, sum (summa) AccSumm from (select ShiftStart, ShiftStop, FullSumm, sum (summa) CompSumm --, OpName, OpComment from (SELECT ISNULL(op2.moment,'01-01-2001') ShiftStart, op.moment ShiftStop, op.summa FullSumm FROM dbo.JournalOp as Op left outer join dbo.JournalOp as Op2 on (op.id = op2.id+1) where (op.moment between @TimeStart and @TimeStop) ) AS Operators LEFT OUTER JOIN (select moment, summa from repDetails where (idClients=0) AND (moment between @TimeStart and @TimeStop)) AS OpSessions ON (OpSessions.moment between ShiftStart and ShiftStop) GROUP BY ShiftStart, ShiftStop, FullSumm) as Rep1 LEFT OUTER JOIN (select moment, summa from repDetails where (idClients<>0) AND (moment between @TimeStart and @TimeStop)) AS AccountsSessions ON (AccountsSessions.moment between Rep1.ShiftStart and Rep1.ShiftStop) GROUP BY ShiftStart, ShiftStop, FullSumm, CompSumm) AS Rep2 LEFT OUTER JOIN [repServices] ON (repServices.moment between Rep2.ShiftStart and Rep2.ShiftStop) AND (repServices.moment between @TimeStart and @TimeStop) and (TypeCost = 1) GROUP BY ShiftStart, ShiftStop, FullSumm, CompSumm, AccSumm) AS Rep3 LEFT OUTER JOIN (select moment,summa from AccountsHistory inner join users on (users.id=operator) inner join usersgroup on (usersgroup.id=users.idUsersGroup) where (What=0) AND (AccountsHistory.moment between @TimeStart and @TimeStop) and usersgroup.name='Staff') AS AccountsAdded ON (AccountsAdded.moment between Rep3.ShiftStart and Rep3.ShiftStop) GROUP BY ShiftStart, ShiftStop, FullSumm, CompSumm, AccSumm, ServSumm) AS Rep4 LEFT OUTER JOIN (select moment,summa from AccountsHistory inner join users on (users.id=operator) inner join usersgroup on (usersgroup.id=users.idUsersGroup) where (What=1) AND (AccountsHistory.moment between @TimeStart and @TimeStop) and usersgroup.name='Staff') AS AccountsReturned ON (AccountsReturned.moment between Rep4.ShiftStart and Rep4.ShiftStop) GROUP BY ShiftStart, ShiftStop, FullSumm, CompSumm, AccSumm, ServSumm, AccAdded) AS Rep5
INNER JOIN JournalOp ON ShiftStop = JournalOp.moment INNER JOIN dbo.Users ON JournalOp.operator = dbo.Users.id
